title: The Rant board feels harsh.
body:
>Introducing; the RANT board. (Which stands for Rambling At New Things not really thought it was clever though.) Have a frustration about the game? Want to scream your head off about Riot nerfing your main? Want to scream about how broken Yasuo is? Well, the rant board is the place for you! Please remember to read the Rant Board rules however before posting! **We will also be redirecting a lot of spam/ranty posts from Gameplay to Rant now that we have this Board.** https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/oXu8xQ5v-boards-update-the-rant-board-is-now-live


In case anyone didn't know there is a new Rant board. You're able to create threads there, which probably an optics thing to make it not the thread Graveyard that it actually is, but commenting on threads is not allowed. Just posting my thoughts here so more people can read. Above is the description of it and below my post in the thread announcement thread. I'm posting this all here because I know most of us here don't care about Boards homepage or go to Discuss The Boards much.


> [{quoted}](name=Colonel J,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=oXu8xQ5v,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2019-03-05T13:05:56.014+0000)
>
> Whose idea was this? I don't feel it was very necessary personally...
> 
> Feels like a place to move terrible Gameplay threads instead of locking/deleting them.
> 
> Maybe it makes less work for the mods to move a thread instead needing to deleting/lock it and write a message why, but being forcefully moved to the Rant board where no one cares to look or is even capable of replying to your post feels like a greater punishment than getting your post locked/deleted.

I think few people will actually use the Rant board instead of posting here on General Discussion or Gameplay. To quote someone who put it better than I ever could:
> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=oXu8xQ5v,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-03-05T04:29:56.100+0000)
>
> Gameplay ~~Plus~~ Minus
